mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.type AS "type.id", a.name AS "name", a.color AS "color", a.specification AS "specification", a.unit AS "unit", a.quantity AS "quantity", a.price AS "price", a.attribute AS "attribute", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", d.name AS "type.name"
LEFT JOIN sys_mdict d ON d.id = a.type
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bus_material( type, name, color, specification, unit, quantity, price, attribute, remarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{type.id}, #{name}, #{color}, #{specification}, #{unit}, #{quantity}, #{price}, #{attribute}, #{remarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bus_material SET type = #{type.id}, name = #{name}, color = #{color}, specification = #{specification}, unit = #{unit}, quantity = #{quantity}, price = #{price}, attribute = #{attribute}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
